hypothesis_content.title: Neutral Regime BTC Volatility Compression Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC trades in a NEUTRAL regime (confidence > 60%) with 20-day realized volatility compressing below 40% and 7-day volatility below 25%, a breakout above the 20-day Bollinger Band upper band on >1.5x average volume will signal a transition to BULL regime and produce a +8% move within 5 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes with compressed volatility represent accumulation phases. Breakouts on high volume from these compressions often signal institutional accumulation completion and mark the beginning of new trending moves. Current BTC volatility is elevated but showing compression signs.
entry_conditions: BTC price closes > 20-day Bollinger Band upper band
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout occurs but fails to sustain >3% above breakout level within 48 hours, or price re-enters Bollinger Band within 2 days.
